body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Data Solutions Ltd. My name is Jack Hill. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Christina Turner.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Christina. Can you provide me with your email address and phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is c_turner@example.com and my phone number is five five five - six seven eight - nine zero one two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information. Can you also confirm your mailing address for us, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my mailing address is one two three Main Street, Cityville, State, ZIP code four three two one zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for providing that. Is there anything else I can assist you with today, Christina?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Christina. Thank you for your time. Have a wonderful day.
